description: Al-Sufi's Book of the Fixed Stars, a revision of Ptolemy's Almagest with Arabic star names and drawings of the constellations. Dated 1009-10 (A.H. 400); colophon,  p. 419.
title: Kitāb Ṣuwar al-kawākib (al-thābitah) [Book of pictures of the (fixed) stars]
author: Ṣūfī, ‘Abd al-Raḥmān ibn ‘Umar, 903-986
